message: Somehow I misplaced my 5v FTDI programmer and needed to push code to an Arduino mini pro.  (I love those little things.)   This instructable shows off a nice, simple workaround to use the FTDI from your existing Arduino Uno, Duemilanove, Diecimila etc board :  http://www.instructables.com/id/Arduino-Examples-2-Use-an-Arduino-as-a-FTDI-Progr/?ALLSTEPS
